Interface Transactionable

All Superinterfaces:
Identifiable, Lockable, Versionable
All Known Subinterfaces:
Node
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface Transactionable
extends Identifiable, Versionable

Object to take part in a transaction.

Version:
$Id: Transactionable.java 179568 2005-06-02 09:27:26Z jwkaltz $
